__e: This town was my home once, and in my absence, Marcel has gotten everything that I ever wanted.
Remember what Marcel said on your last date, after you trumped his wine choice?
I'm never gonna say this again, but Marcel's right.
The only reason I'm standing here is because Marcel came along and turned me before I bled out, too.
So my mate Marcel... nice bloke, don't you think?
Look, I know Marcel's been a total absentee dad lately, but... He always comes through in the end.
I needed a spy, someone on the inside with me who Marcel would never suspect, so I created a day zero and got there first.
Mr. Marx won't manage without you.
I mean, not anywhere Klaus or Marcel would be, which could be pretty much, you know, anywhere, but you know what I mean.
That's why it tried to do the exact same thing to Marcel and to Klaus.
Marcel, bit early in the day for you, isn't it?
Mm... Why don't you just tell me where Marcel is and we can both get on with our day, huh?
